definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: My teacher arranged me homework and asked me to make a bargain with a stranger who looks like a black sheep.
sentences.chinese: 老师给我布置了一个作业，让我和看起来像败家子。

sentences.english: When you look at the books, you see he is just one of a hundred students or whatever.
sentences.chinese: 你看看账本就会明白他只是众多富家子弟中的一员。

sentences.english: Peter is a black sheep of his family. He sold his house for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 皮特真是个败家子，卖了房子换酒钱。

sentences.english: Yesterday, , we went to a big family picnic Dishuiyan Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我们一大家子去滴水岩风景区里野餐。

sentences.english: The man has a large family to support.
sentences.chinese: 这个人要养活一大家子人。

sentences.english: And in that dream rich kids don't pay people to take the SAT.
sentences.chinese: 在这个梦里，富家子不花钱请人代考。

sentences.english: She was asked to draw a picture of her family.
sentences.chinese: 她被要求画一幅她的家子的丹青。

sentences.english: Grandma mouse also shouted, …… . But Jules did not care.
sentences.chinese: 鼠奶奶也发出了阵阵惊叫声，这一家子简直乱了套。

sentences.english: He has to provide for a large family.
sentences.chinese: 他必须得养一大家子人。

sentences.english: It also contained obscenities and angry denunciations of "rich kids."
sentences.chinese: 内容仍是对“富家子弟”的愤怒指责和辱骂。

sentences.english: He had a big family to feed.
sentences.chinese: 他还有一大家子人要养活，他不可能走开啊。

sentences.english: The bear leader bear-led a group of wealthy young men on a cross-country hike.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师带领一组富家子弟作越野远足。

sentences.english: Nothing was stolen, but now a family of birds is living somewhere in my house.
sentences.chinese: 东西倒是一样没少，就是有一家子鸟飞进来扎了窝。

sentences.english: I suppose every family has a black sheep .
sentences.chinese: 我想，每个家庭恐怕都有个败家子。

sentences.english: A fairy lady fell in love with a peasant boy.
sentences.chinese: 一个仙女爱上了一个农家子弟。

sentences.english: 'It's difficult to raise a family on one income. '
sentences.chinese: 单靠一个人的收入很难供养一家子。

definition: the old and the young/the youngest member of the family
(lit. quantity of spirit)/moral character/degree of forbearance/broad-mindedness or otherwise/tolerance/magnanimity
(archaic) we/us/(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
Anping county in Hengshui 衡水[Heng2 shui3], Hebei/Anping district of Tainan City 臺南市|台南市[Tai2 nan2 shi4], Taiwan
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
